# Date.ISO8601FormatStyle.TimeZoneSeparator.colon

**Case**

Specifies a colon character separating the time and time zone in an ISO 8601 date format style.

## Declaration

```swift
case colon
```

## Discussion

The `rawValue` of `colon` is “`:`”.

## Specifying ISO 8601 Format Style Time Zone Separators

- **Date.ISO8601FormatStyle.TimeZoneSeparator.omitted**: Specifies no separator between the time and time zone in an ISO 8601 date format style.
